context: The Estonian word 'meeskond' means team, crew or staff. It refers to a group of people working together - either as the operating crew of a vehicle (ship, aircraft, tank), or as a competing sports team. The word is formed from 'mees' (man) and '-kond' (group/suffix indicating companionship). In Estonian grammar, it follows declension type 22i/külm with d-n gradation.
